Documentation

Touch & Swipe Pad

last updated: Jan 24, 2016

Integrating the powerful Navgroup system into the user interface will allow you to build a quick complex navigation structure to your appliaction, allowing your users move around freely using keyboard events.

HTML markup

Elements with an attribute of data-cwc-controller="touchpad" applied to them will be treated as a Touch & Swipe Pad component by the cwc object.

Add a the cwc style to your Touch & Swipe Pad with the .cwc-style class.

JavaScript Declaration

cwc.ControllerMaster({}) must be included and the cwc.ControllerMaster({}) has to be initiated after the DOM has finshed loading.

Touch & Swipe Pad Instructions

Additional settings can be added to each Touch & Swipe Pad through the use of the data-cwc-instructions data attrabute.

Properties Type Vales
movement-type sting pan or touch
on-movement Hook The hook name created on the client wish to invoke

Movement type

You can change the way the user intracts with the Touch & Swipe Pad by setting the movement-type property within the data instructions attribute.

Properties Type Vales
movement-type sting pan or touch

Pan

You can spesify a Hook to be called for when the user is interacting with the Touch & Swipe Pad. Mutipal Touch & Swipe Pad’s can be defined in one document.

Touch

You can spesify a Hook to be called for when the pull bar is pulling by providing an on-pull parameter within the. Mutipal Pullbars can be set in one document.

On movment

You can spesify a Hook to be called for when the component is moving, by defining a hook the the on on-movement parameter within the components instructions attribute.

Properties Type Vales
on-movment Hook The hook name created on the client wish to invoke
